Source code for langsim.utils.faiss.deps

from __future__ import absolute_import

from pimlico.core.dependencies.python import PythonPackageDependency



[docs]class FaissDependency(PythonPackageDependency):
    def __init__(self, **kwargs):
        super(FaissDependency, self).__init__("faiss", "FAISS Facebook similarity search", **kwargs)


[docs]    def installable(self):
        return False



[docs]    def installation_instructions(self):
        return """\
Install FAISS manually by following the instructions at:
  https://github.com/facebookresearch/faiss/blob/master/INSTALL.md

The process involves setting some flags and running Makefiles, so it's easier to do manually
than to script automatic installation.

Download the entire codebase from:
  https://github.com/facebookresearch/faiss/archive/master.zip
and put it in pimlico/lib/faiss.

Follow the installation instructions, including the 'make py' part.

Copy the python files into your Pimlico virtualenv as follows (replacing 'default' with the name of the
virtualenv you're using, if it's not the default). Run from pimlico/lib:

$ cp faiss/faiss.py virtualenv/default/lib/python2.7/site-packages/
$ cp faiss/python/swigfaiss*.py faiss/python/_swigfaiss.so virtualenv/default/lib/python2.7/

And, if you compiled the GPU version:

$ cp faiss/python/swigfaiss*.py faiss/python/_swigfaiss_gpu.so virtualenv/default/lib/python2.7/

Check it's worked with:

$ ./virtualenv/default/bin/python -c "import faiss"
"""



faiss_dependency = FaissDependency()
